summary: The document is a memorandum related to an investigation under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It references a request for an investigation dated 15 January 1965, concerning a subject's use in Miami under Project OMATE. The case was closed pending further notification after a search of indices revealed attached information.
key_findings: The document pertains to an investigation request under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It references a memorandum from 15 January 1965, indicating an operational approval interest in a subject's activities in Miami under Project OMATE.
A search was conducted in the name of the subject, leading to the attachment of relevant information.
The case was closed pending further notification, as indicated by the document's closure note dated 21 January 1965.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
